page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: Industrial activity in this area fits into the general pattern of S.E.England.There is no large-scale production of consumer products,instead specialised and 'support'industries are found. To the west of Sutton Road in the streets around Southend Greyhound Stadium lies an area of small workshops and storage units. Building, engineering tools,motor-parts and stationery are stored in various buildings. The Central Sorting Office of the Royal Mail in Bircham Road is a big employer. A new building adjacent to Southend Victoria Rail Station is nearing completion and will be in use by 1986. {CONTINUED}
